text: The Judge is a 2014 American crime drama movie directed by David Dobkin. ==Plot== It is about a Chicago lawyer, Hank Palmer, coming home to Indiana after his mother dies. Soon afterwards, his father, Joseph Palmer, a judge, is accused of killing someone in a hit and run accident with the son quickly defending his father even though they have relationship issues. ==Cast== * Neel Sethi as Mowgli * Eddie Redmayne as Newt Scamander * Katherine Waterston as Porpentina 'Tina' Goldstein * Idris Elba as Shere Khan * Scarlett Johansson as Kaa * Tom Hiddleston as James Hine * Lupita Nyong'o as Raksha * Giancarlo Esposito as Akela * Ruby Barnhill as Sophie * Dan Fogler as Jacob ==Reception== The movie received mixed reviews. It got a 47% rating on Rotten Tomatoes. Critics liked Duvall's performance as Palmer. Duvall was nominated for an Academy Award and a Golden Globe Award for his role. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Movies about brothers Category:Incest in movies Category:2010s American crime thriller movies Category:2010s legal movies Category:2010s American crime drama movies Category:American legal movies Category:2010s English-language movies Category:Movies set in Indiana Category:Movies set in Chicago Category:Warner Bros. movies
title: The Judge (2014 movie)
